name: PillMe
0:
”Alexa, open Pill Me.”
”Alexa, ask Pill Me to log a pill.”
”Alexa, ask Pill Me if I have taken my medication.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pill me
des: Pill Me helps you keep track of your once-daily medication. By logging a pill with Pill Me when you take your medication, you can ask at any point during the day if you have taken your pill or not and Alexa will respond either 'Yes' or 'No'. Pill Me's memory is reset each night.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
